alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 2:52PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT COCONINO COUNTY THROUGH 315 PM MST... At 251 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over O`Leary Peak, or 16 miles northeast of Flagstaff, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Nalahiku Pueblo in Wupatki N.M., Sunset Crater N.M., Bonito Campground At Sunset Crater, Sunset Crater Volcano National Monument, O`Leary Peak, Painted Desert Vista, Wupatki National Monument, and Sunset Crater Visitors Center. This includes U.S. Highway 89 between mile markers 433 and 444. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Western Mogollon Rim
